resources.string: Sergio Cucinotta, Marco Turetta, Kia Rashjamshidi

Marco Turetta is a 24-year-old trainee engineer who enjoys extreme ironing, rubics cube and binge-watching boxed sets. He is Fun and helpful, but can also be very lazy and a bit impatient.
He is italian who defines himself as straight. He has a degree in computer engineering.
Physically, marco is in pretty good shape. He is average-height with pale skin, golden hair and blue eyes. Sergio is a 24 year old computer engineer. He loves music, videogames and football. He recently started to produce music with Ableton, varying from lo-fi to pop and alternative music.
He has brown hair but everyone in the last 2 years saw him with blonde hair.
At the moment Sergio is studying for the master degree in Lugano, thanks to an erasmus from Polimi.
Kia Rashjamshidi is a 24-year-old trainee engineer who enjoys extreme ironing, rubics cube and binge-watching boxed sets. He is Fun and helpful, but can also be very lazy and a bit impatient.
He is italian who defines himself as straight. He has a degree in computer engineering.
Physically, marco is in pretty good shape. He is average-height with pale skin, golden hair and blue eyes. Marco Turetta is a 24-year-old trainee engineer who enjoys extreme ironing, rubics cube and binge-watching boxed sets. He is Fun and helpful, but can also be very lazy and a bit impatient.
He is italian who defines himself as straight. He has a degree in medicine.
Physically, marco is in pretty good shape. He is average-height with pale skin, golden hair and blue eyes.
